explains: adj. 有诱惑力的；诱人的；有吸引力的
v. 诱使；引诱；诱惑；怂恿（entice的现在分词）

sentences.en: The offer was too enticing to refuse.
sentences.cn: 这提议太有诱惑力，使人难以拒绝。

sentences.en: A prospective premium of about 30 percent on their initial investment is enticing.
sentences.cn: 初始投资30％左右的预期收益是诱人的。

sentences.en: How the word made the leap from "someone who makes you want to cuddle" to "someone who makes you cringe" isn't really known but there are a few enticing clues.
sentences.cn: 这个词是如何从“一个让你想要拥抱的人”变成“一个让你畏缩的人”，我们不得而知，但其中有一些诱人的线索。
